Some of the distinguishing features of the Trust and its Shares include holding of physical silver, platinum and palladium bullion in the specified ratio, vaulting of Trust silver in London and the vaulting of Trust platinum and palladium in London or Zurich, the experience of the Sponsor's management team, the use of JPMorgan Chase Bank, NA as Custodian, third-party vault inspection and the allocation of almost all of the Trust's Bullion.
